features: USB & Type C Dual Mode Wireless Mouse - This mouse comes with both USB-A and USB-C receivers for wide compatibility, making it a great choice for those with newer computers that are equipped with USB-C ports. It features a convenient switch button located underneath the mouse, allowing for effortless switching between USB and USB-C devices

Mouse & Jiggler Mover 2 in 1 Desgin - In addition to being a regular mouse, this mouse also includes a built-in, undetectable "jiggler mover" feature. This ensures that your computer remains active even when you walk away from your workstation, eliminating the need to enter passwords every time you return

Backlit Mouse with 22 Light Modes - Featuring with RGB rainbow light that adds a touch of elegance and style to your workstation. With 22 different color options available, you can easily customize the backlit to suit your mood or working environment. The light can be turned off for energy saving

Quiet Click Rechargeable Mouse - With built-in rechargeable battery which means you can use this mouse without running the risk of not having a couple of batteries at hand. Responsive buttons provides very soft click with less noise, so you won't disturb others while using this mouse

Portable & Durable Wireless Mouse - If you frequently work from home, enjoy working in cafes, or travel often for work, this mouse is an excellent choice. It combines portability, rechargeability, dual USB and Type C connectivity, and a built-in jiggler feature, making it perfect for on-the-go use

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The mouse can be simultaneously connected to two devices using both USB and Type-C receivers. After switching devices, the Jiggler mode switch only affects the currently connected device. To enable or disable the Jiggler mode, simply press and hold the scroll wheel for 3-5 seconds

All Day Comfort Its sleek and contoured shape is perfectly tailored to fit your hand, providing a natural and comfortable grip that enhances your overall user experience All-in-One Multifunction Mouse Combines several features into one device: LED precision, rechargeable convenience, and a built-in jiggler function, ensuring versatility and productivity for all your computing needs

Light Up Mouse Elevate your experience with the RGB lighting of this mouse. Seamlessly switch between various lighting modes to complement your mood or gaming setup Rechargeable Mouse With a built-in 650mAh rechargeable battery, enjoy a week of LED light usage or 1-2 months without lights on a single charge Portable Mouse The compact and lightweight design allows for effortless portability, providing convenience and flexibility on the go Universal Mouse Jiggler Never worry about frequent logouts again with this mouse's Jiggler feature, the jiggler universal compatible with Teams/Skype/Microsoft Lync/Webex etc

The mouse can be used while charging without needing to turn on the power switch(Even if the switch is in the off position). However, after stopping the charging, disconnecting the charging cable, the switch must be set to the on position in order to use the mouse properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Wireless Mouse with Jiggler and 22 Different Backlit Modes - Compact and Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: This mouse comes professionally packaged in a cardboard box from Seenda with instructions and a recharger. This mouse is Made in China. The black mouse is as pictured in the advertisements. It is a frost black matte finish with a really cool backlighting around the scroll wheel and along the base. It works so well and it is easy to charge and the wireless connection is flawless. I did at first have issues located the Type C and USBC connectors but they are in the bottom of the mouse protected by a switch plate. They are very easy to remove and insert into your laptop. I have not used with this mouse with my MacBook, only my Dell laptop. So my review is when using this with my Dell. I do not usually have any issues with getting logged off since I am constantly working on my Dell, but the jiggler helps when engaged if I am grabbing a quick lunch or drink to keep me connected. It is really easy to engage by pressing down on the scroll wheel for 3-5 seconds and when it backlights green that means the jiggler is active. To disengage just press the scroll wheel again until the green backlight turns off. The smoothness of this mouth is incredible and it is very accurate especially on my desk made from walnut. I have not had any issues with the tracking capability of this mouse. It is compact and very well designed. It is very easy to grip and use. The design is perfect. I am right handed so it works very well for me. I also like the fact that you do not need to use the base perimeter lighting if you want to conserve the battery. I like the base light being on as it just looks really high end. I highly recommend this mouse, even if you do not need a mouse with a jiggler. It is seriously one of the best wireless mice I have ever used. You will not be disappointed. Set up took less than 5 minutes out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It took me a little while to figure out how to properly use this mouse, but I love it! First, make sure you fully charge it. It does not come with a charge (at least mine did not!) Then, look underneath the mouse and there is a small section that you take off which is where the USB-C or USB-A receiver plug is. You choose which one you prefer, that is what connects your mouse to your computer. Make sure you press the "M" button to choose which one you are using, and it should connect.I love the size of this mouse. It is smaller than my old one and it glides around beautifully. The button under the scrolling button changes the RGB light, so you can choose from multi-colored, single-colored, pulsing single-colored, and tons of other choices, which I was not expecting but LOVE. That might be my favorite part of the mouse! There is also an option for "jiggler mode" (choose it by holding the scroll button until it lights up green) it makes the mouse continually move even when you are not touching it. I believe that is to keep your computer from going into sleep mode. The only thing I don't love about this mouse is that after not using your mouse for a minute or two, the RGB lights will shut off until you touch it again. I love the lights, so I wish it would continuously stay on, but I guess that is just me being picky. As far as I know, there is no way to turn off "sleep mode".I am very happy with this mouse, and I absolutely recommend it for casual use. I would not recommend using this if you are a gamer, but that is what gaming mice are for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile Mouse for Modern Connectivity Needs
reviews.reviewText: The seenda Wireless Mouse with Type C compatibility and a Jiggler feature is a game-changer for those seeking convenience and versatility in their peripherals. As someone constantly juggling between devices with different port types, finding a mouse that effortlessly transitions between them has been a challenge - until now.Firstly, let's talk about the design. The sleek, ergonomic build fits comfortably in hand, allowing for extended periods of use without strain. The addition of customizable LED lighting adds a touch of personality to your workspace, making it both functional and aesthetically pleasing.But what truly sets this mouse apart is its connectivity options. With both USB and Type C receivers included, compatibility is never an issue. Whether you're using an older laptop with traditional USB ports or the latest MacBook with Type C, this mouse seamlessly adapts to your setup. The Jiggler feature further enhances this adaptability by preventing your device from going into sleep mode, perfect for presentations or watching movies without interruptions.In terms of performance, the seenda Wireless Mouse delivers precision and responsiveness expected from a premium device. The smooth tracking and adjustable DPI settings ensure smooth navigation across various tasks, from intricate design work to casual web browsing.Battery life is another area where this mouse shines. With long-lasting rechargeable batteries, you can go days without worrying about running out of power. The convenient Type C charging port eliminates the hassle of carrying multiple cables, keeping your setup clutter-free.In conclusion, the seenda Wireless Mouse with Type C compatibility and Jiggler feature is a must-have accessory for anyone seeking a reliable, versatile mouse for their modern workspace. Its seamless connectivity, ergonomic design, and impressive performance make it a standout choice in the crowded market of wireless mice. Highly recommended.
